data.title: ejotherm® H1 - Universal hammer-in anchor
data.meta_description: ejotherm® H1 universal hammer-in anchor for the fastening of insulation boards.► Learn more.
data.text:
Technical specifications

Anchor diameter: 8 mm

Washer diameter: 60 mm

Drill hole depth h

material class A, B, C, D ≥ 35 mm

material class E ≥ 55 mm

Embedment depth h

material class A, B, C, D ≥ 25 mm

material class E ≥ 45 mm

Point thermal transmission X: 0.001 W/K

Use categories acc. to ETA: A, B, C, D, E

European Technical Assessment: ETA-11/0192

Characteristic loads:

Concrete C 12/5 as per EN 206:2013+A1:2016: 0,9 kN

Concrete C 20/25 - C 50/60 as per EN 206:2013+A1:2016: 1,2 kN

Concrete C 20/25 - C 50/60 as per EN 206:2013+A1:2016 thin Concrete members (thin sheet): 1,2 kN

Clay bricks, MZ as per EN 771-1:2011+A1:2015: 1,2 kN

Sand-lime-solid bricks KS as per EN 771-2:2011+A1:2015: 1,2 kN

Vertically perforated clay bricks, HLz as per EN 771-1:2011+A1:2015: 0,752) kN

Sand-lime perforated bricks KSL as per EN 771-2:2011+A1:2015: 1,23) kN

lightweight aggregate concrete LAC, as per EN 1520:2011, EN 771-3:2011+ A1:2015: 1,1 kN

Autoclaved aerated concrete as per EN 771-4:2011+ A1:2015: 0,9 kN
